name: BlissfulRain
0:
”Alexa, open blissful rain”
”Alexa, start blissful rain”
”Alexa, launch blissful rain”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: blissful rain
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Get the rest and relaxation you deserve with the sound of gentle rain entering your room. This simple to use app plays a continuous high quality rain sound for as long as you like. 
Create the perfect ambiance for sleep, work, study, meditation, and soothing baby. 

Just simply say “Alexa, open Blissful Rain”
To stop just say “Alexa, Stop”
To pause just say “Alexa, Pause”
To restart just say "Alexa, Play"
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
